## Pull request title

Use a descriptive title, for example:
Add: Bicep X tutorial by Y  
Fix: typo in README

## Description

Explain what you changed and why. Keep it brief and clear.

## üìã Checklist

Before submitting, please confirm the following:

- [ ] The title follows the required format  
- [ ] The description explains the purpose of the change  
- [ ] The link or resource meets all acceptance criteria  
  - Directly related to Azure Bicep  
  - Freely accessible  
  - Clearly attributed to the author or source  
  - Official Microsoft content or community content  
  - Not already listed  
- [ ] The formatting follows contribution standards  
  - One link per bullet  
  - Sentence case for titles  
  - GitHub repository names in lower case  
  - Alphabetical order within sections  
  - Short descriptive title followed by the link  
  - External links are publicly accessible  
- [ ] Markdown renders correctly in preview  
- [ ] Changes are limited to README or CONTRIBUTING unless there is a valid reason to update other files

## üìù Additional Notes 

Here some additional notes to ensure your PR is easy to follow:

### Branch name

Please use the suggested patterns:

- add/<topic>  
- fix/<topic>

### Commit message

Please us the suggested format:

- Add: "<title>"  
- Fix: "<description>"
